node.Profile: In the last six years at the Global Forum on Agricultural research (GFAR) I have worked extensively on metadata standards and protocols for managing and exchanging information between systems, in strict collaboration with the OEKCS group in FAO.
node.Organization: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO)
